# Masonary.js?

Lets try using the extension to use masonary.js written by `@mcanouil` (mcanouil/quarto-masonry), to give us a cascading gallery, following the suggestions of [Cynthia Huang's post](https://www.cynthiahqy.com/posts/masonry-gallery/) first install using the following command in the terminal:

```
quarto add mcanouil/quarto-masonry
```
then we can create our Pinterest-style cascading gallery:
